c1_evidence: Read his website, looked promising. Showed up at his SF office in the morning as a walk-in. Asked the receptionist for an appointment, first thing she gave me was a form to fill out - after filling it half way, I asked when I could possibly see Dr. Rabanus (as I had a bit of a dental emergency, front tooth chipped pretty badly). She seemed surprised, and said that he rarely there, and that I should just call his number directly to setup a time. The form was to see a completely different Dr. that works from that office. Not friendly or helpful, seemed annoyed that I was a "walk-in". So I left a voicemail for Dr. Rabanus, and did not receive a call back.
c2_evidence: Dr. Rabanus is amazing. He's the only cosmetic dentist accredited by the American Academy of Cosmetic Dentistry in San Francisco. He very quickly becomes your friend. He cares about you as a person. You work with him directly - always. He's incredibly responsive. He's a perfectionist. He's an artist. He wants you to be absolutely satisfied with the end result and he, too, wants it to be perfect for you. You absolutely will not be disappointed! I cannot recommend him highly enough.

Up front communication/Listening - Dr. Rabanus listens to your specific needs, takes the time to answer your questions in up front consultation (many of mine were related to process/technology), and even did a photoshop mock up of my potential smile post-op. Other doctors I talked to were not as patient or willing to go in-depth with me. Additional bonus is he is very flexible to your schedule and works nights/weekends. He will make you feel confident going in.
Quality - I

c1_evidence: Everyone working there is very friendly and super helpful with any questions you might have

The front staff are amazing too! Great communicators (I was a tech recruiter, university library supervisor, and also studied conversation in a master's Linguistics program) you can tell have decades of customer service experience, are well treated, and just really enjoy coming into work

Alex (the staff member who greets you upon entrance) especially has helped me so many times with rescheduling  and answering all of my questions. When I answer my phone, his voice literally puts a smile on my phase. Alex, thanks for everything. Keep up the good work and I'll see you next time

Staff are nice and professional. Moreover, their office is super dog friendly! I brought my little chihuahua in last time. The staff were happy to watch my dog while I was in the x-ray room. He could even stay on my lap when I was getting my teeth cleaned.
c2_evidence: Dr. Jasselle is by far the best dentist I've seen. She takes her time educating patients on oral care and reviewing your gum health. I would recommend her to anyone

I have never had a more efficient experience for a dental visit. I was in and out of there in 20 minutes, teeth fully assessed, professionally cleaned, flossed, and mouthwashed (granted no oddities happening with my teeth)! This is honestly a new standard for how I want all of my appointments to go
First off, I've never been so relaxed and respected at a dentist's office

He really took the time to educate and explain the treatment plan, made me feel super comfortable. I was devastated to find out I needed a deep cleaning and multiple fillings but honestly couldn't believe how pleasant the whole experience was,

c1_evidence: Great office located directly in downtown SF. The front desk staff is so friendly and nice!

Patient with Dr. P for 4 years in SF then moved to NYC for 4 years, then came back and no doubt who my dentist would be. As long as I work in SOMA, I'm going to Dr. Perona. He's honest, his staff (Monica at the front desk, all the hygienists) are a pleasure.

Blown away by my experience - excellent Dentist office! Every single person I met including the receptionist, hygienist, radiologist and Dr. Perona himself were incredibly kind, friendly and informative.
c2_evidence: Dr. Perona was responsible to recommend a great oral surgeon for my implant and helped to alleviate my concerns about the procedure.
Was looking for a new dentist and was referred to Dr. Perona. I was super impressed with he and his staff's level of professionalism, friendliness and skill!

Dr. Perona is an excellent dentist. In the years I have been seeing him I have always gotten the very best of care. He carefully explains his plans for treatment before starting and makes sure I experience no unnecessary pain.

I've never felt upsold, they've always worked to treat cavities or near-cavities without drilling if possible. Also, did a teeth whitening there and it was great, need to set up another session because I drink way too much coffee! Anyway, the office is super clean, in a great location in SOMA and like I said, you won't be upsold and you'll feel like family.
Fantastic Dental Service!  Friendly Staff are all trained on the most up-to-date procedures and equipment.  I enjoy going here.

c1_evidence: Professional, friendly, competent, organized
Scheduling is generally a breeze and reception is very friendly
Hygienist was thorough, positive, and friendly
Everyone is very friendly and talkative
The staff is super friendly
Facility is clean and Covid compliant.
c2_evidence: Excellent staff, great dental work
I receive the best care in the world when I'm in the chair
They have been a great dental practice over the years
I actually felt like they knew what they were doing
Dr.Byun really cares about his patients
Top notch, excellent care
Dr. Byun was gentle with the numbing and drilling process
Dr. Byun is on top of emailing and calling me personally to discuss the situation
Dr. Bynun and staff are the best.

c1_evidence: "It was a pleasant experience from the moment I entered into the dental studio"
"The office is clean, and all the staff are so kind and accommodating"
"Staff was also amazing, extremely helpful, and were quick to respond to any messaging"
"The staff that checked me in was calm which helped me relaxed"
"The whole team is super professional and lovely to deal with"
"They put in such effort to make patients feel comfortable"
"Everyone at Zen Dental is so professional and kind".
c2_evidence: "I appreciate the way Dr. Carpenter listened to my concerns and explained the treatment plan in detail"
"The procedure was smooth and painless, and I can already see a noticeable improvement in my dental health"
"I had Dr. Nina and she was super nice and when the x-ray machine was being used sped up the process and did my gum measurements while I was waiting"
"Dr. Nina and the Dental Hygienists that have worked on my teeth are excellent"
"They are knowledgeable, professional and caring"
"With some other dentists, I feel like treatment is being forced on me, but never with Dr. Pokhrel"
"She is always upfront about whether I need the treatment now (and clearly explains why) or whether it can wait"
"It's great to know that I can trust my dentist in this way"
"Also, the level of dedication and time she spends with you is something I've rarely experienced with a dentist"
"I've recommended Zen Dental Studio to lots of friends without hesitation, and can honestly say my teeth have never been better"
"This is hands down the best dentist I've had".
